channel.title: MicroPython for BeagleConnect Freedom
channel.description: Recent content on MicroPython for BeagleConnect Freedom

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Yadnik Bendale and I will be working under the project MicroPython for BeagleConnect Freedom(https://elinux.org/BeagleBoard/GSoC_2021/Micropython_for_BeagleConnect_Freedom). The project includes porting MicroPython and CircuitPython support to the BeagleConnect Freedom Device as well as writing drivers for interfaces like GPIO, I2C, SPI, PWM, UART and ADC in MicroPython. Thanks for reading!
